metadata.title: CVE-2024-46836 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: aspeed_udc: validate endpoint index for ast udcWe should verify the bound of the array to assure that hostmay not manipulate the index to point past endpoint array.Found by static analysis.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
